body.p: To his excellency Thomas E Bramlett. Your petitioner G. W. Falkner states that at the presant term of the Whitly Circuit court he was fined the sum of seventy five Dollars for failing to put up his tavern rates he states that he was entirely ignorant of the law requiring any such thing -- that so soon as he asertained that it was his duty to procure from the clerk & put up in the public room of his house the rates as fixed by the County court he done so, he prays your excellency to remit said fine
Sworn to by before me by by G, W, Faulkner
I have no dout but the petitioner would have procured the rates and complied with the law if he had known its requirements and I hope your Exceltency will remit said fine

yours Truly
David G Lyttle
Granville PeaL
H F Finley
J, C, Watkins clk
